page.title: 11HAMEFARIN 1985
page.content: 1985 IS THE YEAR OF THE{SECOND {HAMEFARIN.}1960 WAS THE VERY FIRST HAMEFARIN.THE HAMEFARIN IS WHEN SHETLANDERS ALL OVER THE WORLD WHO EMIGRATED COME BACK TO SHETLAND FOR A HOLIDAY.ON SATURDAY 11TH MAY{THE {HAMEFARIN PAGEANT}AND FIREWORKS DISPLAY WAS THE CLIMAX OF THE SECOND HAMEFARIN.THERE WERE 28 FLOATS IN THE PAGEANT.THE THEME FOR THE PAGEANT WAS{ {SHETLAND LIFE NOW AND IN THE PAST.} THERE WERE FLOATS DEPICTING OIL, FISHING,LEISURE AND KNITTING.LATER VIKINGS FROM UP HELLY AA ROWED OUT TO CLICKIMIN BROCH AND THERE WAS A BATTLE TO SAVE THE VIKING PRINCESS FROM CLICKIMIN BROCH.THEN THEY THREW TORCHES IN THE GALLEY AND PUSHED IT OUT IN THE LOCH. TO FINISH THERE WAS A FIREWORKS DISPLAY WITH SPECTACULAR FIREWORKS.
